meanings.def: a large notice, often with a picture on it, that is put in a public place to advertise something
examples: a poster campaign (= an attempt to educate people about something by using posters)
a wanted poster (= with a picture of a person that the police are looking for)
They put up a poster advertising the concert.
Huge election posters suddenly went up all over the town.
A massive poster campaign was launched, warning people of the dangers of drugs.
The police have put up wanted posters describing the man.

meanings.def: a large picture that is printed on paper and put on a wall as decoration
examples: posters of her favourite pop stars
He was the poster boy for indie rock.
His walls are plastered with posters of rock stars.

meanings.def: a person who posts a message on a message board (= a place on a website where people can read or write messages)
